title: Features & Benefits of ARIES Side Bars
description: Upgrade your vehicle entry with a set of one of ARIES eight series of unique side bars.
tags: Aries, Side Bars, Running Boards, Nerf Bars

asset.title: ARIES Side Bars
asset.description:
http://www.ariesautomotive.com

Side bars on your truck or SUV are not just to make it look pretty. When we imagined the ARIES Side Bar product line, we wanted it to be more than a decal for your vehicle; we wanted something that would offer a solid place to plant your foot. That is why our side bars are vehicle-specific, and made with quality materials. 

We offer a 3" round, 4" round & oval and 6" oval side bars in polished and black finishes.
asset.author: ARIES Automotive
